title: Swap $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: Replace f(x) with $$y$$ and swap $$x$$ and $$y$$ in the equation.

title: Isolate the squared term
text: Subtract $$5$$ from both sides and then divide by $$3$$ to isolate $$x^2$$.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: Take the square root of both sides, remembering to choose the negative root due to the given domain.
